name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocknative Gas Fee Estimator for Ethereum, Base, Arbitrum, and More

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optimize transaction costs with real-time, multichain gas price predictions and advanced models for Ethereum, Polygon, Sei and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⛽  Accurate Gas Price Predictions: Harness Blocknative’s real-time global mempool data and advanced statistical models to deliver precise gas estimates for next-block or next-ten-second confirmations.

🚀 Supports Legacy and EIP-1559 Transactions: Whether working with Type 0 or Type 2 transactions, Blocknative delivers reliable gas estimates tailored to your needs.

🌏 Multichain Ready: Our estimator supports a wide range of networks, including:
• Ethereum (Mainnet: 1)
• Polygon (Mainnet: 137)
• Base (Mainnet: 8453)
• Optimism (Mainnet: 10)
• Arbitrum One (Mainnet: 42161)
• Sei (Pacific-1: 1329)
• Fantom (Mainnet: 250)
• Gnosis (Mainnet: 100)
• Immutable zkEVM (Mainnet: 204)
• Linea (Mainnet: 59144)
• opBNB (Mainnet: 13371)
• Blast (Mainnet: 81457)
• zkSync (Mainnet: 324)
New networks are added regularly to expand multichain support!

📈 Mempool Monitoring and Statistical Models: Our API leverages real-time mempool analysis and advanced machine learning algorithms, providing next-block or next-ten-second gas price predictions based on network-specific dynamics. Unmatched reliability, even during periods of network congestion.

⚙️ Developer-Friendly API: Integrate precise gas predictions into Dapps using Blocknative’s Gas Platform API. Enhance transaction success rates and reduce costs by helping developers set optimal gas fees.

📚 Learn More: Explore docs - https://www.blocknative.com/gas-estimator
💬 Connect: Join our Discord community at - https://discord.com/invite/KZaBVME
